Text: jump on the spam juggs ( the message just before mine)

I remember reading the book couple of years back and that wasnt bad, lets see how hollywood handled the film. With some luck it will features some scenes that Victor Hygo never even dreamt of when writing it, like Jean Valegan being a black belt and kicking ass through out and just maybe getting his hands on a gattling gun maybe at the end of the film and killing bad guys by the hundreds!

Oh and and forget to add, that after all that went down and all the guys that die, Jean Valegan saves Kosette's life just so that she can became a slut just like her mom and get knocked up with another baby so that it can start all over....and so the long day wears on!
